title: Topological Dark Solitons and Phase-Locked Screening in Two-Sector Gauge--Scalar Systems
description: Standard open-science package including LaTeX source, Python code, and documentation for a Helmholtz–Chern–Simons model of topological dark solitons, with screening profiles and phase-locking energetics.
notes: Use CC-BY-4.0 for the paper on Zenodo and Apache-2.0 for the code on GitHub.
